server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • server.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener

    public class Server
extends java.lang.Thread
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This is the server. The server is responsible for accepting incoming connections, managing games and players, and so one. The server holds a lobby of players not in a game, and a list of games and their associated players. A player can not be in the lobby and a game at the same time.
    Author:
    Jonathan Juursema & Peter Wessels
